name: NYDailyNews
text:
Thousands gathered Sunday throughout NYC in the fourth day of protests over the death of George Floyd, with the NYPD and businesses braced for violence and looting.

After two nights of violence, the protests began peacefully. 

https://t.co/gebIQmggzt

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: SEE IT: Peaceful demonstrators barred violent looters from breaking into a Brooklyn Target during chaotic protests over the death of George Floyd.
https://t.co/fGpdu5slxI

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The American Civil Liberties Union is encouraging people participating in protests to download an app that documents police interactions.

The app was designed to document potential police misconduct in case situations cannot be de-escalated.

https://t.co/PYn1TZ4zt0

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Michael Jordan spoke out against the “ingrained racism and violence towards people of color,” joining countless others reeling from the death of George Floyd

“I am deeply saddened, truly pained and plain angry."

https://t.co/jAoJbycf3S

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Dozens of cities, from Rochester, N.Y., to Richmond, Va., to counties in California, and Ohio, to Washington, imposed curfews as protests continued to spin out of control.

https://t.co/8LJkg0IJad

name: NYDailyNews
text:

https://t.co/RHv4j2Vi1r

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: Violence and destruction at protests was the fault of “anarchists,” Mayor de Blasio claimed.

He offered no evidence for the assertion.
https://t.co/wfzj5FljBf

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: Two young boys and their mother were found dead inside their Queens home Sunday in what cops suspect was a double murder-suicide, according to sources.
https://t.co/20CAZSyUwB

name: NYDailyNews
text:
A photo obtained by the Daily News shows a lawyer using a Bud Light bottle with a rag as a Molotov cocktail. She's accused of trying to torch an NYPD cruiser in Brooklyn. 

https://t.co/tFZ2Z0UGKc

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Mayor de Blasio’s daughter was arrested during a protest near Union Square on Saturday, police sources said.

https://t.co/yqA6wZdIZD

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Coronavirus has made it more complicated for states to prepare for hurricanes. The biggest issue: how to safely use public shelters. 

https://t.co/d9VhRvBLz4

name: NYDailyNews
text:
Minnesota Attorney General Keith Ellison will take the lead on all prosecutions related to George Floyd’s death. 

The move is meant to reassure activists and civil rights advocates that the state is determined to seek justice. 

https://t.co/G33k8sgsR0

name: NYDailyNews
text:
RT @NYDailyNews: Mayor de Blasio announced an investigation into the NYPD's aggressive conduct during George Floyd protests.

He's facing outrage over his defense of the department, including a police car that drove into protestors blocking a street.
https://t.co/fbUVfvZYHt

text:
